headline: WHAT I DO...
dain:
I'm a Front End Developer, Visual Designer, and Conceptual Artist stationed somewhere in between JPL, Art Center College of Design, the Norton Simon and Cal Tech.

I've been working in the interactive design field since the late 90's and also maintain a conceptual art practice. I provide services in consulting and execution for graphic design, web development, user experience design, print design, and art direction. Clients and collaborators include artists, production agencies, commercial photographers, restaurants, and skateboarding brands. My artwork has been exhibited both nationally and internationally.

If you are interested in seeing additional work samples and a full CV Email Me.
